# tds-breadcrumb

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                  | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `current`  | `current`  | Boolean for the current link                 | `boolean` | `false` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Toggle the disabled state for the Breadcrumb | `boolean` | `false` |
